captions.text:
[narrator]
Tom was thinking about Kim's breasts.
Mum, I'm not doing any homework!

I don't do homework anymore,
you KNOW this.

Mrs Johnson. For your crimes against
Equesteron, you are to be banished to

a parallel universe where you will
live out the rest of your days in exile.

Tom, d'you reckon there
are parallel un--

Where do I turn...3D? I don't...
H...help...I...I...

comments.text:
So tell me if I have this straight...

Some random person wondered if his pony could fly, so his pony answered him 
by flying. Then the pony, while flying, was shot down. The shooting blew it 
up and it's decapitated head fell onto a human, creating the first "hyper 
intelligent horse person." This then created a whole HIHP takeover and the 
entire Earth was purged of normal humans, replaced by HIHPs. But this all 
happened in a parallel universe, because the decapitated head thing was in 
a deleted scene. Then the first HIHP, which was a crazy maniac, was 
banished to our world and went on a killing spree.﻿
comments.author: AweMire

comments.text:

tendencies caused it to get divorced by a dead guy.
